reviewText:
I am a woman with no experience in makeup at all. Actually I never had a complete makeup on me' because I never knew the right way to do it or even how to start.
I must say that I was surprised
 The video is the clearest and most direct lesson u can get. The instructions are very simple and clear so it was a very enjoyable lesson for someone like me that didn't know anything about makeup.
I was looking for someone to teach me. The video promised to guide me through the basic personal makeup techniques and so it did and in grate success.
I know that I can now go on to the next level of the personal makeup art.
 I can only give it 5 stars and really recommend this video to all of you looking for the basics of personal makeup.
I understand that the video won the Videographer Award for excellence it deserved it
Well done

This is a very simple & honest video.
I think everyone can learn something from this interesting
& well made lesson.
When can I buy it on DVD? as I my wife will soon wear out
this extremely useful tool.
Thanks for the tips. I rate this 9/10.
Barry levinson

I am a "two left handed" woman who for sometime is trying to learn to apply my own makeup, in a more appilling manner without any successes. I have seen many videos and books on the way, all seem to be, or too complicated or incomplete in the information they give, so I could only get part of the instructions. This video is the first I have seen that is simple very clear and reveals all stages of the process in extreme close-up shoots and exhalent explanations, so that after I have seen it and followed  the practice instructions, I was beautifully made-up. This is a wonderful video to all you girls who would like to learn to apply their own makeup in the simplest way and in the most professional manner I recommend it warmly .enjoy!!!!

As a professional who work in the makeup industry I've seen a lot of "professional" videos and other collaterals about makeup. Most of them are hidden commercial. This is the first time that I've seen so comprehensive and systematic video which teaches the user from A to Z all what she needs in the basic personal makeup.
